Cost of Development: Building a robot is a complex and expensive task
Power Source: A robot needs a power source to operate, but finding a portable, reliable and sustainable one is a challenge
Design and Complexity: As robots get more complex, designing and managing the different components becomes increasingly difficult
Safety: Ensuring the safety of both the people interacting with the robot and the robot itself is of high importance
Battery Life: For long-term use, a robot should have a long battery life
